00032 /*
00033  *  Function pointer for writing.
00034  *  \param data     The ancillary "helper" data
00035  *  \param io       The output interface
00036  *  \param error    populated on error
00037  */
00038 typedef NITF_BOOL(*NITF_IWRITEHANDLER_WRITE) (NITF_DATA *data,
00039                                               nitf_IOInterface* output,
00040                                               nitf_Error *error);
00041 
00042 
00043 /*
00044  *  Function pointer for destructing the data structure
00045  *  \param data     The ancillary "helper" data
00046  */
00047 typedef void (*NITF_IWRITEHANDLER_DESTRUCT) (NITF_DATA *);

00055 {
